title: "The Diagnostic Performance of Machine Learning in Breast Microwave Sensing on an Experimental Dataset"
excerpt: "Objective: This paper assesses the diagnostic performance of deep learning methods for tumour detection in breast microwave sensing (BMS). Methods: A convolutional neural network (CNN) was used to predict the presence of a cancerous lesion in data from experimental scans of MRI-derived phantoms."
